Lykke Group

  • About
  • Services

Lykke Group is a global investment and alternative asset management and advisory firm.

Lykkeâ€™s reputation for excellence is well known among investors and clients all around the world.

Services

We research and analyze global sustainability, investment, and healthcare trends to provide our clients with the insight they need to make informed decisions about how to invest, operate, and innovate in a sustainable manner.

  • Advisory

    Lykke Advisors offers world-class advisory services in the area of sustainable finance, innovation, and healthcare. We help our clients understand how global sustainability megatrends such as food insecurity, increasing carbon emissions, climate change, and healthcare affect their business.

  • Investments

    Lykke Capital actively invests in technology start-ups in India, across sectors from seed to pre-Series A-stages.

Team

Our team has a wealth of expertise in the global investment and sustainability arena. Our network, experience, and knowledge extend from the fields of sub-Saharan Africa to the trading desks of Wall Street.
